Description: Today I have an Epiphone Les Paul Custom Goth Edition up for sale at a hefty discount. My family has pooled together some money for me to buy a new guitar on black friday/cyber monday. After taking advantage of some sweet deals I feel happy passing on a great guitar. It plays and sounds great but does have some wear and tear. The neck appears to be cracked although I had someone suggest it may not be completely cracked. When unstrung the crack does not separate. The nut is not glued down but does not move when playing. The guitar stays in tune even through some gnarly bends thanks to the Grover Tuners. There are some minor cosmetic issues that I have added pictures of. If you would like some extra pictures taken please contact me and I will be happy to oblige. MSRP : $399 USDUSED ONLINE : $225 USD - $250 USDBUY IT NOW : $150 USD + Shipping!!! Title: *USED* Epiphone Les Paul Custom GOTHIC EDITION - *Damaged Neck*
